thread.title: 2018 Kia Niro Plug-In: Bigger Battery and Bigger Range
thread.title_full: 2018 Kia Niro Plug-In: Bigger Battery and Bigger Range

author: Tony Markovich
title: 2018 Kia Niro Plug-In: Bigger Battery and Bigger Range
text:
-Kia has an internal plan to better its overall fuel-economy numbers by 25 percent between 2014 and 2020, and it has been working toward that target with numerous new green-focused models. Following the release of the Niro hybrid crossover —the automaker’s dedicated “eco” model—and amid rumors of an all-electric version of the Stinger sports sedan, Kia has now brought forth a plug-in-hybrid version of the Niro crossover. READ MORE ›› 
-
